content.rendered:
I’m so excited to introduce our new D’Adhesive Felt Tip Eyeliner Pen. Already viewed as one of the best lash products of 2020, it has been featured in Women’s Wear Daily, InStyle.com, and several other publications.

This incredible pen will change your strip lash application forever! The liquid adhesive liner acts as a dual-purpose high-drama felt tip pen. It draws a highly pigmented, flawless line. Featuring a super-fine felt tip for precise application and a cruelty-free adhesive that lasts up to twelve hours, applying lashes has never been easier. 

This adhesive tip liner is great for a subtle cat-eye, a dramatic wing, and everything in between!

Line, Lash and Done!

Xo Xo, Dionne

Don’t forget to try out some of our favorite products – D’Lashes Matte Lipstick, D’Lashes Candles, New Lash Adhesive Eyeliner, and lash out with D’Medium Flare individual lashes.
